def.dt: :a game played on a large field by two teams of nine players who try to score runs by hitting a small ball with a bat and then running to each of the four bases without being put out He likes playing baseball. We watched baseball on TV last night. often used before another noun a baseball player/team/game a baseball bat/card see pictures at bat glove
:the ball used in baseball see picture at ball

:a rounded cap that fits close to the head and that has a long visor Baseball caps were originally worn only by baseball players as part of their uniform but are now worn by many people. see picture at hat
